document.full_text: tens of billions of dollars of chinese investment could flood into the united states in the next decade, creating a multitude of american jobs if officials do not succumb to a political backlash and throw up barriers, according to a report released on wednesday.
document.title: report urges u.s. open door to china investment flood
lines_and_colors: tens of billions of dollars of chinese investment could flood into the united states in the next decade, creating a multitude of american jobs if officials do not succumb to a political backlash and throw up barriers, according to a report released on wednesday.
